name: INFERNAL CASINO
description:
In the depths of brimstone and hellfire, fight your way through the devil's hellish casino and get riches beyond imagine!  

unfortunatly, we overscoped the game thus it being quite imcomplete.  we apoligize, and we will strive to make a better version in the future

~ controls ~

  • move : wasd / arrows 
  • confirm : e
  • aim + shoot : mouse
  • special : right click
  • enter : pause

Artist : mars  https://mars-vr.itch.io/

Composer : Mystro https://mystro1234.itch.io

Programmer : nightlight https://nightlight00.itch.io
